about:
Passionate engineering leader with 20 years of experience in mobile software development and electric vehicle technologies. Proven expertise in Mobile Security, Telematics, AI/ML, IoT, Solar Energy Systems and Electric Vehicle Battery Management Systems and large-scale system design.

I thrive on bridging the gap between business strategy and technical execution, empowering teams to deliver scalable, reliable, and innovative solutions. Currently solving EV Battery issues using AI-powered software solutions.

positions.title: Sr. Manager - Mobile Apps (iOS, Android, EVSE, IOT, Cloud)
positions.description:
Responsible to build and manage a highly competent team & organisation of IOT, EVSE and Mobile Apps for Enphase apps & software platform to support Cloud and Digital Transformation.

Directed a team of 30+ engineers to deliver impactful solar energy solutions.

Architected and executed project roadmaps, streamlining processes and improving code quality through
comprehensive reviews.

Optimised app usability by implementing features such as IQ Gateway, IQ Battery, Provisioning and Functional Validation

Amplified product adoption and user satisfaction through continuous feature enhancements and bug fixes.

The Installer Toolkit App provides a simple workflow to perform a successful installation of solar systems
 Steps includes
           - Creating sites
           - Adding devices and Arrays (IQ Gateway, Micro Inverters, IQ Battery, Generator, EVSE)
           - Gateway connectivity using AP mode / WiFi / Bluetooth
           - Provisioning Devices
           - Functional Validation
           - Report Generation
           - Post commissioning workflows.

Current appstore/playstore ratings - 4.3

Appstore link -> https://apps.apple.com/us/app/enphase-installer-toolkit/id1452583697?platform=iphone
Playstore link ->https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.enphase.installer&hl=en_IN&gl=US&pli=1

EV Solutions for Business - https://enphase.com/ev-chargers/business

Led the end-to-end development of McAfee Mobile Security for iOS, achieved a 4.7-star rating. (12+ engineers)

Delivered advanced security features, including VPN, Jailbreak detection, Secure data vault, device discovery, Automotive Cybersecurity and location tracking, ensuring robust mobile app protection.

Led Agile adoption as a Certified Scrum Product Owner, optimised backlog management and roadmap
execution and analytics tracking.

Designed and implemented a Telematics Security feature to analyse vehicle driving patterns, enhancing safety and security.

Achieved over 3M direct app downloads with a customer-centric approach to feature delivery. Integrated in-app purchase and increased paid user adoption by 30% over 12 months by improving usability & feature set.

Keywords

McAfee Mobile Security (iOS and Android) | Analytics | Messaging | WiFi Security | Device Security | Secure Vault | Dark Web Scan | Threat Detection | Safe Browsing | Logger Framework | In-app Purchases | VPN | Tech SDKs | Partners Customisation | McAfee Student Developer Program  (CSR) | Apple Appstore Management

received.name: Ashish Bansal
received.headline: Third degree connection
received.text: I hired Sudarshan at Enphase to lead ITK engineering team. Installer Tool Kit is a key mobile application to help installers commission the Enphase system for customers. Sudarshan played a key role in migrating the application to latest tech stack for iOS, Android and backend services and resolve critical customer issues to improve overall customer experience. This helped in significantly improved app rating. Sudarshan is technically sound, hardworking, and extremely good team player. It was a pleasure working with Sudarshan and I wish him all the best for future endeavours.

received.name: E-ming S.
received.headline: Third degree connection
received.dateLine: October 13, 2023, E-ming worked with Sudarshana but on different teams
received.text: I had the pleasure of working closely with Sudarshana as the primary developer which lead to leading the team that launched McAfee's first iOS security app. He was great to collaborate with in determining what was possible on iOS and was flexible in accommodating my evolving requirements as we figured out how to make the product useable and drive growth in usage over time. He's a great technical partner for any product manager that gets to work with him.

given.name: Vijo Joseph
given.headline: Third degree connection
given.text: I have worked with Vijo Joseph for 3.6 years. I found him to be very easy to work with, professional and highly competent. His expertise on Leading team, Tracking priorities, Resolving the external dependencies,  iOS App Development, Design patterns outstanding. I always found him focused, energetic and hard working, consistently driving to deliver results on multiple projects. I highly recommend Vijo Joseph. He's a great technical leader for any engineering manager that gets to work with him.

given.name: Shamika N.
given.headline: Third degree connection
given.dateLine: August 1, 2021, Sudarshana worked with Shamika on the same team
given.text: Shamika worked as Group Product Manager when I managed the Mobile Security iOS project at consumer mobile team.  We have worked together on the complex modules like Vault, Analytics and Messaging on iOS and Android security products. Shamika is Brilliant,  Dedicated, Proactive, Approachable and Reliable Manager.  She has tremendous potential and I wish her well in all her future endeavours.

headline: Attending Alva's Institute of Engineering and Technology
about: As a passionate Electronics and Communication Engineering student, I am driven by a curiosity for emerging technologies like IoT, embedded systems, and wireless communication. With hands-on experience in circuit design, microcontroller programming, and signal processing, I am eager to apply my skills to solve real-world challenges. I thrive in collaborative environments, where innovation and problem-solving are at the core. My goal is to contribute to cutting-edge projects in telecommunications, robotics, or embedded systems, while continuously expanding my technical knowledge and skills. I am excited about the future of ECE and my role in shaping it.
designation: Alva's Institute of Engineering and Technology

I‚Äôm eager to leverage my technical background and analytical acumen to deliver innovative, data-driven solutions and make meaningful contributions in the world of analytics and consulting. fullName: Abhiroop Mukherjee (Avi), MBA¬Æ, PMI-PMP¬Æ, PMI-ACP¬Æ, PSM II¬Æ (He/Him)
headline: Senior IT Project Manager | Remote & Onsite | Agile Leader | Experience: 16+ years | Deliver High Impactful Projects On Time & In Budget | Process Improvement | Cost Optimization | Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt
about:
‚úÖ I am an Experienced, Data-Driven Senior Project Manager (Remote & Onsite) in IT industry with a proven track record in Agile project management, Servant Leadership, Kanban, Scrum, Extreme Programming (XP) Methodologies, with expertise in leading high impact and complex IT projects in Software Development, IT Infrastructure, Support domain, and I am a Lifelong Learner  #AlwaysBeLearning

‚úÖ I am adept in:
üëâ Stakeholder Management
üëâ Risk Management
üëâ Cost & Budget Management

‚úÖ I am Certified:
üèÜ PMI¬Æ Project Management Professional (PMP)
üèÜ PMI¬Æ Agile Certified Professional (ACP)
üèÜ Advanced Professional Scrum Master (PSM II)¬Æ
üèÜ Google¬Æ Project Management Professional (PMP)
üèÜ AIGPE¬Æ Lean Six Sigma Black Belt
üèÜ AIGPE¬Æ Lean Management Expert
üèÜ AIGPE¬Æ VSM Expert
üèÜ Microsoft Azure Cloud Practitioner
üèÜ AWS Cloud Practitioner
üèÜ Google Cloud Practitioner (GCP)

‚úÖ Major Achievements:
üëâ Spearheaded cross-functional and diversified Teams (30+ members) and fostered Team Spirit to work and collaborate towards achieving business objectives or milestones
üëâ Achieved Overall Positive VOC and CSS of 98%
üëâ Orchestrated multiple International high impact projects related to Migration, Implementation and Integration and successfully delivered On Time, Within Budget with Medium to Minimal Changes in Scope
üëâ Mitigated Risks related to Vendor availability and Excessive Cost Proposal from vendor and thereby saved high Dollar$ Costs for Client.

‚úÖ I have proficient hands-on experience in:
üèÜ Oracle SQL
üèÜ Microsoft Power BI
üèÜ Microsoft Project
üèÜ Jira & Confluence (Atlassian)
üèÜ MS Azure
üèÜ Google Cloud
üèÜ Google Apps
üèÜ MS Office 365 Apps.

‚úÖ My Key Skills are:
üëâ Project/Program Management, Servant Leadership, Risk Management
üëâ Budget Oversight, Cost Control, Financial Reporting
üëâ Process Optimization, Change Management, Continuous Improvement
üëâ ITIL, SLA/KPI management, Vendor management, Stakeholder Management

‚úÖ My Mission is:
üëâ To leverage my technical knowledge, soft skills, and experience to solve business critical problems, drive productivity and bring about harmonious correlation/alignment between IT resources and Business Objectives.
üëâ To acquire and leverage valuable insights from cross functional and diversified Teams to enhance operational excellence and achieve customer delight with positive feedback (CSS).

‚úÖ  I am interested to find new opportunities to lead impactful project teams.
üëâ If you‚Äôre looking for a Results-Driven & Experienced Leader in IT Program/Project management, I am happy to connect and collaborate ü§ù

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description:
üëâ Working as Project Manager across various geographies: The US, UK, Europe, and in domains: SDLC, IT Development & Support, F&A from Initiation till Closure (BAU Handover) phase, and boosted Client CSAT to 98%.

üëâ Devised and implemented Agile based methodologies to streamline operations in various projects so that SLA (Service Level Agreement) could be complied with as planned, without much deviation (95% on track).

üëâ In depth knowledge and expertise of preparing and updating Project Charter, Project Management Plan, Gantt Chart, WBS (Work Breakdown Structure), Project Budget, RAID log, Communication Plan, RACI Matrix, Change Request Management, Incident Management, Risk Management, Action and Issue Logs.

üëâ Proficiently used Oracle SQL, MS Azure, Microsoft Project, Jira, Confluence, G-Suite to track and  analyse project data.

üëâ Conducted planning and operations meetings and Team huddles and identified areas for improvement and any possible scope creep.

positions.title: Lead Process Developer
positions.description:
üëâ Worked as Team Lead in Financial Analyst Team where I enhanced operational excellence by developing processes using AGILE and LEAN SIX SIGMA methodologies across multiple US Projects in various domains like AR / RTR / Asset Accounting.

üëâ Helped Team Members utilize ETL functionality utilizing Power Pivot, Power Query, DAX in Power BI and advanced MS Excel 365 functions for data analysis and data modelling.

üëâ Worked on various technologies like Oracle Financials, POWER BI, SAP ERP, Office 365 apps for financial data analysis and data modelling.

üëâ 	Boosted Client Satisfaction Score (CSS) to 98% through fast and knowledgeable issue resolution and ensuring minimum TAT and maximum level of Accuracy by properly coordinating Team efforts.

üëâ Coordinated team schedules to keep shifts properly staffed during busy periods, and keeping Team motivated and ensured good Team health to perform under tight schedule and meet deadlines.

üëâ Certified Lean and Six Sigma professional and won Performance Excellence Award multiple times for undertaking various Process Automation & Improvement projects.

positions.title: Operations Manager
positions.description:
‚Ä¢ Supervised operations team at Head Office to provide operational excellence and ensure customer satisfaction at branch level.
‚Ä¢ Monitored employee productivity and optimized procedures to reduce costs at branch level.
‚Ä¢ Introduced new methods, and systems to reduce turnaround time (TAT) in loan processing and disbursement.
‚Ä¢ Monitored key performance metrics to identify areas for improvement.
‚Ä¢ Performed statistical analyses to gather data for operational and forecast team needs as per Head Office instructions.
‚Ä¢ Cultivated and strengthened lasting client relationships using strong issue resolution and dynamic communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Scheduled employees for shifts, taking into account customer traffic and employee strengths at various branches.
‚Ä¢ Monitored daily cash position of branches for discrepancies and also monitor day-to-day transactions logged in Oracle Financials E-CBS ERP system and oversee completion and accuracy of Bank Reconciliation Statement (BRS) on monthly basis.
‚Ä¢ Report out regularly about findings and deviations to higher management in MIS reports at regular intervals for further decision-making.

positions.title: Assistant In Charge
positions.description:
‚Ä¢ Generated repeat business through exceptional customer service and responded to customer concerns through friendly and knowledgeable service.
‚Ä¢ Monitored Cash intake and Deposit records, Cash Disbursements, increasing accuracy, and reducing discrepancies.
‚Ä¢ Mentored team members to enhance professional development and accountability in workplace.
‚Ä¢ Supervised day-to-day operations to meet performance, quality and service expectations.
‚Ä¢ Implemented unique system of Record Life-Cycle methodology to produce high quality systems to meet customer expectations so that accounting records are strictly maintained as per Indian Accounting Standard (Ind-AS).
‚Ä¢ Report out regularly to Management as per MIS guidelines about findings and deviations, along with preventive resolution (Root Cause Analysis and 5 Why Analysis).

positions.title: Accountant
positions.description:
‚Ä¢ Completed daily cash functions like account tracking, payroll and wage allocations, cash, and banking reconciliations and report to Chief Accountant.
‚Ä¢ Detected and corrected mistakes early on and implemented systems to avoid recurring issues related to Finance and Accounts.
‚Ä¢ Gathered financial information, prepared documents, and closed books on monthly and annual basis.
‚Ä¢ Handled day-to-day accounting processes to drive financial accuracy as per Accounting Standards.
‚Ä¢ Maintained up-to-date knowledge on professional accounting standards to manage financial recordkeeping.
‚Ä¢ Used advanced ERP software along with MS Excel to prepare documents, reports, and presentations.
‚Ä¢ Maintained integrity of general ledger and chart of accounts as per Indian Accounting Standard (Ind-AS)
‚Ä¢ Oversee accuracy of Inventory and Stock reports, sale bills and purchase orders raised and Daily Cash Register.

headline: Enterprise Program & Project Manager | Risk & Data-Driven Strategist | Security & Quality-Focused Leader | Process Optimizer | Efficiency Advocate | Dedicated Mentor | Exploring New Challenges & Opportunities
about:
I‚Äôm a strategic program and project leader passionate about AI-powered solutions that fuel innovation, streamline operations, and deliver measurable customer value. With a strong bias for execution and deep expertise in cross-functional delivery, I help enterprises accelerate transformation, strengthen governance, and elevate performance, especially in complex, regulated environments.

With over a decade of experience, I have successfully led multimillion-dollar initiatives across AI/ML data services, ERP and SaaS implementation, human capital strategy, and large-scale infrastructure development. My leadership covers all phases of program and project execution‚Äîfrom vision to velocity. Whether launching a $60M urban development initiative, overseeing AI/LLM annotation programs, or architecting a Project Management Academy, I consistently deliver scalable, high-impact results.

My Areas of Expertise and Specialization include:
Enterprise Program & Project Leadership | AI/ML Support | LLM Supervised Fine-Tuning Support | Agile & Risk Management | Scalable PM Frameworks | SaaS/ERP Implementation | Strategic Change Enablement | Organizational Strategy | OKRs & KPI Governance | Executive Stakeholder/Client Engagement | PM Academy Design & Delivery | Logistics | Quality Control/Assurance | Urban Infrastructure Delivery | ClickUp | Microsoft Project

Selected Achievements:

Liberty Source: Led 30+ digital transformation projects, improving project tracking accuracy by 85%, reducing delivery timelines by 60%, and enabling faster executive decision-making through enhanced reporting visibility. Supported a successful change management initiative and increased project delivery throughput by 70%.

Eastman & Associates: Managed HR transformation engagements, including a $600K workforce optimization project that increased regulatory compliance by 80%, improved employee retention by 75%, and boosted HR process efficiency by 70%.

Regency Group: Delivered $60M+ in urban and agrarian infrastructure projects, reducing time-to-completion by 70% and achieving 100% regulatory compliance‚Äîsecuring multi-phase government approvals and sustained development funding.

I thrive at the intersection of strategy and structure, leading with clarity, building high-performing global teams, and championing continuous improvement‚Äîensuring delivery aligns innovation with compliance, performance, and stakeholder trust.

üìß sommerjdandrade@gmail.com ‚Äì Let‚Äôs connect if you seek a transformative leader to shape and scale your next program, project, or AI-driven enterprise initiative.

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description:
Liberty Source is a US-based corporation specializing in human-in-the-loop data services that enable organizations to maximize returns on their AI, ML, and BI investments. By offering fully onshore operations, Liberty Source ensures high levels of data security, seamless real-time collaboration, and accurate cultural interpretation‚Äîcritical for sensitive and complex data initiatives.

Our comprehensive service offerings include image annotation, data labeling, computer vision calibration, natural language processing (NLP) validation, training data curation, and a range of customized data optimization solutions. These capabilities support the development of high-quality, trustworthy AI models and accelerate enterprise transformation.

What sets Liberty Source apart is our strong commitment to social impact. As a Public Benefit Corporation, we focus on recruiting veterans and military spouses‚Äîprofessionals known for their discipline, adaptability, and mission-focused mindset. Their contributions consistently drive operational excellence and data integrity for our clients.

Key Achievements:

Project Management Academy: Spearheaded the design and successful launch of Liberty Source‚Äôs internal Project Management Academy, aimed at developing leadership skills, standardizing delivery practices, and building a scalable project management culture. This initiative led to an 80% increase in project throughput and a measurable rise in delivery quality and consistency.

ERP and SaaS Implementation: Successfully led the implementation of enterprise-level ERP and SaaS projects, improving system efficiency, data visibility, and cross-functional alignment‚Äîlaying the foundation for sustainable digital operations.

These accomplishments reflect Liberty Source‚Äôs broader mission to deliver high-impact, secure, and socially conscious data solutions that align innovation with execution.

Open to new opportunities | Recently impacted by company-wide layoffs at Liberty Source.

positions.title: Project Management Specialist
positions.description:
Eastman & Associates Limited is a trusted Human Resource consulting firm based in Trinidad & Tobago, proudly serving clients since 1983. With over 40 years of success, we specialize in executive and administrative recruitment, HR strategy consulting, and organizational development for both local and international businesses.

Our client portfolio includes leading organizations such as Caribbean Airlines, BG, and Trinidad Tourism Limited. Backed by a team of Trinidad‚Äôs most qualified HR consultants, we deliver tailored, high-impact solutions across the HR lifecycle‚Äîfrom strategic sourcing and behavioral interviewing to compensation planning, policy development, and compliance alignment.

Eastman & Associates is committed to helping organizations build high-performing, values-aligned teams. Our approach emphasizes rigorous assessment across experience, competence, and character‚Äîpositioning us as a trusted partner in workforce transformation and long-term HR success.

Key Achievements:
As Project Management Specialist (Jan 2022 ‚Äì Feb 2023), I led several HR transformation projects across diverse sectors:

Directed full lifecycle execution of HR initiatives including recruitment infrastructure, performance systems, and compensation modeling.

Designed and secured executive approval for five customized HR project proposals aligned with each client‚Äôs culture and strategic goals.

Delivered a $600K engagement that transformed a manufacturing firm‚Äôs HR function‚Äîresulting in an 80% increase in regulatory compliance and a 75% improvement in employee retention.

Authored tailored employee handbooks and organizational policies that enhanced operational continuity and ensured compliance.

Achieved 100% client satisfaction through structured delivery, transparent communication, and strategic engagement.

üìç Learn more at www.eaasltd.com.

positions.title: Project Officer/Human Resource Officer/Property Administrator
positions.description:
Regency Group is a multidisciplinary consulting firm based in Trinidad & Tobago, offering integrated services in land development, property and asset management, operations, and project management. Through its property management arm, Regency Homes Limited, the Group delivers strategic value to both public and private sector clients via customized infrastructure and operational solutions.

With decades of experience leading complex initiatives, Regency Group is known for its end-to-end project execution‚Äîfrom concept and design to completion and compliance. Our consultancy model blends deep industry expertise with a practical understanding of regulatory frameworks, stakeholder engagement, and funding structures to drive sustainable development.

Specializing in both urban and agrarian infrastructure, Regency Group prioritizes measurable outcomes, budget discipline, and seamless delivery. The firm is trusted for its ability to manage large-scale projects while aligning technical execution with community needs and long-term growth strategies.

Key Achievements:
As Project Manager and Operations Manager (Mar 2013 ‚Äì Dec 2020), I delivered high-impact results across Regency‚Äôs project and property management portfolio:

Led operational strategy across six subsidiaries, aligning KPIs with business goals to enhance profitability and service quality.

Delivered urban housing and agrarian projects valued at over $60M, with 100% on-time and on-budget outcomes.

Oversaw full project lifecycles, including design, procurement, execution, and compliance reporting.

Cultivated key relationships with government agencies, securing multi-phase approvals and sustainable funding.

Implemented process improvements that increased throughput and reduced overhead.

Authored funding proposals and strategic documents supporting multi-year development and growth initiatives.

positions.title: Director
positions.description:
Tiny Mite Entertainment is a dynamic event management company specializing in delivering premium, tailor-made events across the Caribbean region. As Director, I contributed significantly to shaping the Group‚Äôs strategic framework, enhancing service offerings, and expanding market reach. Our focus on creativity, flawless execution, and client satisfaction has positioned Tiny Mite Entertainment as a trusted leader in the Caribbean‚Äôs event management landscape.

Key Achievements:

Developed and implemented strategic initiatives that expanded the company‚Äôs service portfolio and regional footprint.

Led cross-functional teams to successfully plan and execute high-profile events with consistent positive client feedback.

Enhanced operational workflows, resulting in improved project delivery timelines and cost efficiencies.

Cultivated strong client relationships across the Caribbean, driving repeat business and referrals.

Contributed to revenue growth through targeted business development and innovative event solutions.

positions.title: HR Assistant (Appointments)
positions.company: University of the West Indies, St. Augustine Campus
positions.description:
The University of the West Indies (UWI) is the Caribbean‚Äôs leading tertiary institution, renowned for academic excellence and regional leadership. As HR Assistant for the Faculty of Humanities and Education, I led and supported human resource operations across five departments, ensuring the seamless execution of faculty staffing processes and academic lifecycle management.

This role involved driving several HR process improvement initiatives while overseeing daily operational tasks, including:

Designing and publishing job postings for academic roles in line with university protocols and departmental needs.

Managing recruitment advertising and serving as point-of-contact for internal and external stakeholders throughout hiring campaigns.

Drafting, reviewing, and issuing employment contracts for new hires, contract renewals, adjunct staff, and visiting academics.

Administering staff leave, travel/study grant correspondence, and entitlements for academic personnel.

Coordinating directly with department heads, central HR, and faculty administrators to resolve employee matters efficiently and compliantly.

Key Project Achievement:
Led the design and rollout of a faculty-wide HR process improvement initiative focused on streamlining contract management and academic benefits administration. This included the standardization of contract templates, introduction of a centralized tracking system for leave and grant requests, and creation of a faculty-specific HR process guide. These changes reduced administrative turnaround times by 30%, improved policy adherence, and strengthened stakeholder satisfaction across departments.

This role blended daily operational HR execution with continuous improvement efforts‚Äîsupporting academic excellence through optimized people processes and service delivery.

educations.school: University of the West Indies, St. Augustine Campus
educations.field: Psychology with minors in Human Resource Management and Gender Studies

received.name: Mihai Rotaru
received.headline: IT Risk Technical SME at Freddie Mac
received.dateLine: April 16, 2025, Mihai worked with Sommer on the same team
received.text:
It's been a pleasure working alongside Sommer over the past two years, and I'm proud to recommend her for her outstanding project management expertise. Although new to the industry, Sommer quickly absorbed IT and data concepts, ERP systems, and system dependencies - approaching each with curiosity, confidence, and a drive to learn. These skills only deepened as she immersed herself in increasingly technical projects.
Sommer brings a thoughtful and thorough approach to every initiative, ensuring that both internal and client-facing requirements are clearly understood and communicated. Her strong focus on IT and security considerations has been instrumental in delivering secure, compliant, and well-scoped solutions.
What truly sets Sommer apart is her ability to proactively identify risks and her exceptional talent for translating complex technical details into clear, actionable insights for stakeholders. She consistently served as a vital bridge between business and project teams, adding tremendous value throughout our organization.
I highly recommend Sommer for any project management role - particularly those requiring a strong grasp of IT dynamics, security, risk mitigation, and cross-functional collaboration.

received.name: Denise Sweeney
received.headline: Professional Strategic Marketing Leader | Brand & Content Creator | Sales Operations & Data Mgt | Certified BarreFlow Instructor
received.dateLine: March 12, 2025, Denise worked with Sommer but on different teams
received.text:
I had the pleasure of working closely with Sommer at Liberty Source, and I can confidently say that she is an exceptional Project Manager with over 15 years of experience in project execution, operations, and risk management across diverse industries. Her expertise in transforming strategic objectives into actionable, value-driven initiatives is truly remarkable.

At Liberty Source, Sommer oversees 30+ projects, collaborating with C-suite leaders and cross-functional teams to deliver cutting-edge AI, ML, and business intelligence solutions. Her strategic leadership ensures that project goals are aligned with business objectives, driving measurable impact and success.

During our time together, Sommer provided invaluable assistance, guidance, and leadership in project managing the growth strategy for sales and marketing. Her ability to align project goals with business objectives was key to our success. She excels in developing project management frameworks that boost efficiency, leading large-scale projects in diverse industries, and streamlining operations to enhance productivity and revenue.

What sets Sommer apart is her ability to proactively identify and mitigate risks, ensuring project success through exceptional risk and agile management. She excels in designing frameworks and methodologies that boost efficiency and team performance, optimizing processes to enhance overall effectiveness.
Sommer is a true team player. She is always willing to lend a helping hand, share her knowledge, and support her colleagues. Her positive attitude and work ethic are truly inspiring, and she plays a crucial role in building a cohesive and high-performing team.

I highly recommend Sommer for any Project Management role she pursues. Her exceptional skills, dedication, and collaborative spirit make her an invaluable asset to any organization.

given.name: Denise Sweeney
given.headline: Professional Strategic Marketing Leader | Brand & Content Creator | Sales Operations & Data Mgt | Certified BarreFlow Instructor
given.dateLine: March 10, 2025, Sommer worked with Denise on the same team
given.text:
I had the opportunity to work with Denise as her business unit project manager on several digital marketing growth campaigns for Liberty Source PBC. At Liberty Source, we enhance AI and ML systems with high-quality, human-in-the-loop data services, supporting AI initiatives across various industries.

Denise combines strategic vision with hands-on execution, ensuring each campaign aligns with business objectives and delivers measurable results. She excels at crafting compelling messaging, optimizing multi-channel marketing strategies, and leveraging data-driven insights to improve performance. Denise consistently identifies growth opportunities, implements innovative solutions, and adapts strategies based on real-time analytics.

Her ability to translate complex technical concepts into clear, engaging content played a key role in expanding our reach and driving audience engagement. What sets Denise apart is her collaborative approach and proactive mindset. She communicates effectively, aligns cross-functional teams, and fosters an environment where creative ideas translate into impactful outcomes.

Denise‚Äôs dedication, strategic thinking, and ability to manage complex projects make her an invaluable asset to any organization. I highly recommend her for any role that requires a dynamic, results-driven marketing and communications leader.

given.name: Jeremy Rogers, MBA
given.headline: Vice President Finance | Strategic Finance Partner | Corp FP&A
given.dateLine: October 28, 2024, Sommer worked with Jeremy but on different teams
given.text:
Working closely with Jeremy Rogers, VP of Finance at Liberty Source, I can confidently say he is an exceptional finance professional. Jeremy combines deep financial expertise, strategic vision, and collaborative leadership, creating a substantial impact across the organization.

Jeremy‚Äôs comprehensive knowledge of financial operations, budgeting, and forecasting has been essential in driving company growth and ensuring financial stability. He proactively identifies risks, capitalizes on opportunities, and implements strategies that align with the company‚Äôs long-term goals. His ability to navigate complex financial landscapes with a sharp focus on operational efficiency is truly impressive.

What distinguishes Jeremy is his collaborative style and skill in partnering with cross-functional teams. Whether working with operations, HR, or business development, Jeremy fosters open communication and aligns financial strategies with organizational priorities. His empathetic leadership promotes trust and accountability, building strong relationships at all levels.

Jeremy is also a forward-thinking leader who prioritizes innovation and continuous improvement. He leverages technology and best practices to streamline processes, enhance reporting, and deliver insights that drive business decisions. His leadership during key initiatives, like budgeting cycles and financial audits, has been pivotal in upholding operational excellence.

Working with Jeremy has been a pleasure, and his leadership has made a lasting impact. I highly recommend Jeremy Rogers to any organization seeking a strategic, results-driven finance leader. His expertise, professionalism, and collaborative approach make him an invaluable asset to any team.
